> Tucson ceases his fire. With his warning shot made, he rolls forward on h=
is wheels with the light damage not effecting his engine nor his wheels. He=

continues his relentless push forward.

> " Hit me all you want, I'm not g=
oing anywhere except forward. We came here to retrieve our comrade, no matt=
er what slag you throw at us. That is all we want, nothing more nothing les=

d bring him home, and we will leave you undesturbed."

 moan and she continue to firing gainst the insect like aliens.

The move f=
oward by Tuscon is successful. Although Talon's shot misses
its intended ta=
rget, it instead hitting high and wide, Legacy's shot
finds its mark hittin=
g the insect square in the chest and sending it
flying back into the wall. =
It lands with a crunching sound and slides
to the ground, its optics comple=
tely dull.

Meanwhile the rest of the troopers surge foward! however due to=
 the
extensive armor plating of Tuscon and his grim determination, they
pus=
h through with only a modicum of trouble. The insects leap after
Tuscon, bu=
t thier blades slide inaffectually along his armor, cutting
only into his p=
aint job, but little else. They are quickly left behind

any speed.

The road ahead looks clear. all the way to the main chamber abo=
ut a
half a mile away where Rodimus and presumably where what the insectoid=

The ground rumbled for a moment, and=
 then a blast of cool air rolled
